so_30757220: ln -s /usr/bin/java /usr/bin/yourApp
/usr/bin/yourApp {options} YourApp.class
ps -ef |grep yourApp

java {options} -DyourApp="yourApp" YourApp.class
ps -ef |grep yourApp

Explanations about Options.-f:
Do full-format listing. This option can be combined with many other UNIX-style
 options to add additional columns. It also causes the command arguments to be
 printed. When used with -L, the NLWP (number of threads) and LWP (thread ID)
 columns will be added. See the c option, the format keyword args, and the format
 keyword comm.
